column4: I download Breezy and verify with md5sum. I did burnt the cd using the default package on my Hoary system. This finished ok, at least that's what last message said. After about 5 minutes into the install on my Dell latop I get a message that the bootstrap program is corrupt. What do I do next.
maybe bad CD-R? scratches on the surface?
I guess that's posssible, I'll try burnning another on.
